entry.title: Proposed BIP editor: Kalle Alm
entry.summary: Based on the given context, it appears that there is a disagreement regarding the addition of Kalle Alm at this time. The person expressing these views appears to be opposed to the addition of Alm. Additionally, they believe that those who support adding him are mistaken in their belief that it will resolve the situation with Luke-jr's inappropriate behavior regarding PR1104.It is not clear from the context who Kalle Alm is or what his role would be if he were added. However, it seems that bringing him into the situation is not viewed as a solution by everyone involved.Overall, this brief statement expresses a difference of opinion and suggests that there may be other factors at play that are not fully explained. Further context may be necessary in order to fully understand the situation and the reasons for these opposing views.
